title: Temporary Fix for Typer breaking changes
body:
This freezes the version of the package `typer-slim` to `0.12.5` as a temporary fix for typer-breaking changes so users installing this from `pipx` can still use the current version

Fixes #96
author: Rugz007

comments.body:
The failure turned out to be due to `venvstacks` setting the app name in a convoluted way when I could instead just set it directly. #98 switches over to the supported API for this, resolving the incompatibility.

Thanks for the attempted fix!
